original_title: Milk powder importers announce reduction in prices
original_body_lines: The prices of imported milk powder will be reduced with effect from Monday (27 March), the Milk Powder Importers’ Association announced today (23 March).
Accordingly, the price of a one kilogram packet of imported milk powder will be reduced by Rs. 200, while the price of a 400 gram packet will be reduced by Rs. 80.
